title: HashiruAI
description:
The Expert Orchestrator AI: Dynamically Adapting, Budget-Aware, and Precisely Tailored to Your Needs
A dynamic multi-agent system achieves adaptability and intelligence through on-demand skill learning and information integration, while intelligently managing resources to minimize costs by using expensive models only when necessary for a personalized experience.

title: gem5 Vision
description:
Improved the gem5 Resource Infrastructure by implementing advanced search functionality for resource discovery within the gem5 ecosystem.
Introduced a comprehensive resource categorization system, allowing users to access specific resource types based on the irrequirements.
Expanded gem5's database support by integrating various options, providing users with multiple choices for storing,retrieving, and managing resources.

title: QuixFolio
description:
QuixFolio is an easy-to-use tool that helps you build professional portfolios in just minutes.
QuixFolio is completely open-source.
Simply select a template, add your information, and QuixFolio will take care of the rest. It will even host your portfolio on GitHub pages for you!
Over 190 visitors and 1000+ page views in the first week of alpha.

title: Stadia Wireless
description:
Allows the Google Stadia Controllerto be used wirelessly with the use of websockets.
Has 450+ stars and has been featured on multiple articles including The Verge, Ars Technica, and Digital Trends.

title: VeggieBuddie
description:
An app forthose with diet restrictions, tells if safe to eat using an image of the ingredients
Most Social Good Hack, Second best use of Google Cloud Platform at HackDavis.
One of the top 20 solutions at Google's Solution Challenge.
